definitions.title: adv.
definitions.body: So (PH. NH Targum id.; Syr. ken is then, Ar. la=kin, la=kin=a, but: prob. from the demonstr. √ ka, found in [[כִּי]] etc., Kö:ii. 1, 254); ([[הִיא]]) [[כֶּן־הוּא]] Ge 44:10 + 4 t.:—so (i.e. usu., as has been described or commanded, with ref. to what has preceded), mostly of manner, but sts. also of quantity, quality, or degree:

definitions.title: 1. a.
definitions.body: Ju Jdg 5:31 [[כן יאבדו]] so perish thy enemies, Job 5:27 [[הִיאכֶּן־]], Jdg 8:13 [[כן ארחות כל שׁכחי אל]], Pr 6:29, Pr 8:13, 2Sa 16:23, Is 36:6, Is 47:15 [[כן היו לך]], Nu 13:33 [[וכן היינו בעיניהם]]; Nu 9:16 [[כָן יהיה תמיד]] Ex 10:14, Ex 10:14 [[לא היה כן ארבה]]´[[כמהו וג]] (i. e. in such numbers), 1Ki 10:12 [[כן עחי אלמגים לא בא]], v:1Ki 10:20, 2Ch 1:12, 2Ch 1:12, Ju Jdg 21:14 [[להם כן ולא מחאו]] and they did not suffice for them so (viz. in such numbers of them as there were); 1Ki 6:26 [[וכן הכרוב השׁני]], Ez Eze 41:7; ´[[וכן ל]] Ex 27:11, 1Ki 10:29, Ez Eze 40:16, 2Ch 35:12, cf. 1Ch 23:30; ´[[כן ל]] Ex 25:33 (cf. Ex 26:24), Jos 21:40.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: the force of [[כֵּן]] has sts. to be elicited from the context : 1Ki 2:7 [[כי כן קרבו אלי]] (sc. with kindness such as that enjoined in v:a), 1Ki 20:40 [[כן משׁפטך]], Je 14:10 [[לנועכן אהבו]] (i.e. not less than ´[[י]] has withdrawn from them v:Je 14:9, Gf Ke; Gie prop. [[אָכֵן]]), Ps 61:9 [[שִׁמְ ְכֵּן אֲזַמְּרָה]] (Hi [[כְּחִדְקְְ]], implied in v:Ps 61:6–Ps 61:8), Ps 63:3 [[חֲזִיתִ ְכֵּן בַּקּׂדֶשׁ]] (sc. with the longings of v:Ps 63:2), v:Ps 63:5 [[אֲבָרֶכְ ְבְחַיׇּיכֵּן]] (sc. [[כְּרׂב חַסְדְְּ]] v:Ps 63:4), Ps 65:10 [[כִּי כֵן תְּכִינֶהָ]] (i.e. so generously, v:Ps 65:10), Ps 90:12 [[לִמְנוֹת יׇמֵינוּ כֵּן הוֹדַע]] (Hi ´[[כְּיִרְאַת י]] v:Ps 90:11), Ps 127:2 [[כֵּן יִתֵּן לִידִידוֹ שֵׁנׇא]] (sc. as abundantly; but Che [[אָכֵן]]), Pr 24:14 (see v:Pr 24:13), Is 52:14 [[כֵּן מִשְׁחַת מֵאִישׁ מַרְאֵהוּ]] (sufficiently to justify [[שׁממו עליך רבים]]).

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: [[כן]] occurs freq. in partic. phrases, as (a) with [[הָיׇה]], esp. [[ויהי כן]] and it was so Ge 1:7, Ge 1:9, Ge 1:11 + , 2Ki 2:10 if thou seest me taken from thee [[יהי־לך כן]] let it be to thee so (sc. as thou desirest), 2Ki 7:20, with [[עשׂה]] (esp. [[וַיַּעַשׂ]], [[וַיַּעֲשׂוּ]]) Ge 29:28, Ge 42:20, Ge 45:21 + oft., Ju Jdg 7:16 [[וְכֵן תַּעֲשׂוּמִמֶּנִּי תִּרְאוּ]], + ´[[ל]] Ge 42:25 [[ויעשׂ להם כן]], Ex 22:29, Ex 23:11 ´[[כן תעשׂה ל]], De 22:3, 2Sa 12:31, 1Ki 11:8 (cf. 1Ki 6:33, 1Ki 7:18); Ge 29:26 [[לא יֵעָשֶׂה כן במקומנו]], Ge 34:7, 2Sa 13:12; rarer usages, [[דִּבֶּר כֵּן]] Ex 6:9, [[אמר כן]] 1Ki 22:8, [[כֵּן אמרתם]] Ez Eze 11:5, Eze 33:10, ´[[אָמֵן כֵּן יאׁמַר י]] 1Ki 1:36 (cf. Je 28:6), [[וגם שׁאול אבי יׁדֵעַ כֵּן]] 1Sa 23:17; [[אָהֵב כֵּן]] (idiom.) to love (it) so, † Je 5:31, Am 4:5; (b) Ge 50:3 [[ימלאו ימי החנֻטים כי כן]] (cf. Ju Jdg 14:10, 2Sa 13:18, Es 2:12); (c) alone, [[אִם כֵּן]] if it be so † Ge 25:22, Ge 43:11; † [[כִּי־כֵןוַיִּרְאוּ]] 1Sa 5:7, [[יׇדַעְתִּי כִּי־כֵן]] Job 9:2; (d) [[לא כן]] not so (viz. as has been described or implied), with a subst. Nu 12:7 [[לא כן עבדי משׁה]], 2Sa 20:21, 2Sa 23:5, Ps 1:4, Job 9:35 b [[כי־לא־כן אנכי עמדי]] not so am I with myself (i.e. I am not conscious of being one who would fear him, v:a), with a vb. De 18:14 [[ואתה]] ´[[לא כן נתן לך י]] (not so,—viz. as implied in v:a), 2Sa 18:14, Is 10:7 [[לא כן יְדַמֶּה]],[[לא כן יחשׁב ]], absol. Ge 48:18 [[לא כן אבי]], Ex 10:11.
Often, to emphasize the agreement, in answer to [[כְּ]], and [[כַּאֲשֶׁר]]: viz.

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: [[כֵּן]] …[[כְּ ]], (a) Ge 44:10 = Jos 2:21 [[כדבריכם כֶּן־הוּא]] acc. to your words, so be it, 1Sa 25:25 [[כי כשׁמו כֶּן־הוּא]], Ps 48:11, Pr 23:7 [[כֶּן־הוּא]] (after conj. [[כְּמוֹ]]), Ez Eze 42:11 [[כְּאָרְכָּן כֵּן רָחְבָּן]]; (b) Le 27:12 [[כְּעֶרְכְּךָ כֵּן יִהְיֶה]], 2Sa 13:35, Nu 8:4, Nu 9:14, Nu 15:20, De 8:20, Ju Jdg 11:10, so after [[כְּפִי]] Nu 6:21; (c) …[[כֵּן]]…[[כְּכׂל ]] 1Sa 8:8, 2Sa 7:17, Je 42:5; (d) in similes, (a) 2Sa 14:17 [[כן]] ´[[אדני המלך כמלאך הא]], Je 18:6, Ps 123:2, Ps 127:4, Pr 10:26, Pr 26:8, Pr 26:19, Pr 27:8, Pr 27:19, Ct So 2:2, So 2:3; (b) Joe 2:4 [[כְּפָרָשִׁים כֵּן יְרוּחוּן]], Is 31:5, Is 38:14, Ps 103:15, Pr 26:1, Pr 26:2; (g) Ps 42:2 [[כן]] …[[כאיל תערג ]]´[[נפשׁי וג]] like the hind which etc., Ps 83:16, Is 61:11, Is 63:14, Job 7:3, so after [[כמו]] Is 26:17; (d) Je 2:26 [[כֵּן הוֹבִישׁוּכְּבשֶׁת]] …[[גַּנׇּב ]], Je 6:7, Je 34:5 (rd. [[כְּמשׂרפות]]), Ez Eze 22:22 (cf. v:Eze 22:20), Eze 23:44, Eze 34:12; cf. (of degree) Eze 35:15 (om. LXX Co), Ho 4:7 [[כְּרֻבָּם כֵּן חָָֽטְאוּ לִי]]. Of time (un-common) 1Sa 9:13 [[כְּבׂאֲכֶם הָעִיר כֵּן תִּמְחְאוּן אׂתוֹ]].

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: [[כַּאֲשֶׁר]] …[[כֵּן ]] …, (a) Ex 7:6 [[כן עשׂו]] ´[[כאשׁר חוה י]], Ex 12:28, Ex 12:50, Ex 39:43 (cf. Ex 27:8), Nu 8:22 (cf. Nu 5:4), Nu 17:11, Nu 36:10, Jos 14:5 (all P); Ge 41:13 [[כאשׁר פתר כן היה]], Jos 10:1, Jos 10:39, Jos 11:15, Ju Jdg 1:7, Jdg 15:11 b, Ps 48:9; (b) (freq.) Nu 2:17 [[כֵּן יִסָָּעוּכאשׁר יַחֲנוּ]], Ex 1:12 (of degree = the more…the more) [[כַּאֲשֶׁר יְעַנּוּ אׂתוֹ כֵּן יִרְבֶּה וְכֵן יִפְרׂץ]]; (c) Ge 6:22 [[אשׁר חוה אתו אלהים כן עשׂהככל]], Ex 39:32, Ex 39:42, Ex 40:16, Nu 1:54, Nu 2:34, Nu 8:20, Nu 9:5 (all P), cf. Ex 25:9 ([[וְכֵן]]), simil. 2Sa 9:11, 2Ki 16:11, cf. Jos 1:17, Je 42:20; (d) Ex 27:8 [[הֶרְאָה אתך כן יעשׂוכאשׁר]], 2Sa 16:19, 1Ki 2:38, Is 20:4, Is 52:14 f.; with the same vb. repeated Le 24:19, Le 24:20, De 28:63 [[כן ישׂישׂ]] …[[כאשׁר שׂשׂ ]], Jos 23:15, 1Sa 15:33, 1Sa 26:24, 1Ki 1:37, Is 10:11, Je 5:19, Je 31:28, Je 32:42, Je 42:18, Ez Eze 12:11, Eze 20:36, Zec 7:13, Pr 24:29; Nu 14:28 [[אעשׂהאם לא כאשׁר דברתם כן]], Is 14:24, so after [[הלא]] Is 10:11, after asseverative [[כי]] 2Sa 3:9, 1Ki 1:30; so [[כֵּן]] … ´[[כָּל־עֻמַּת שֶׁ]] † Ec 5:15; (e) Ju Jdg 7:17 b [[כאשׁר אעשׂה כן תעשׂון]], Le 27:14, Nu 15:14, cf. Je 39:12; (f) in similes, De 12:22, De 22:26, Am 3:12, Is 65:8, Je 13:11. †

definitions.title: d.
definitions.body: …[[כן כאשׁר ]], (a) Ex 7:10 ´[[ויעשׂו כן כאשׁר חוה י]], v:Ex 7:20, Jos 4:8, 2Sa 5:25, Ez Eze 12:7, cf. Ge 50:12, Nu 8:3; iron. Am 5:14 [[אתּכם כאשׁר]] ´[[אמרתם יהי כן י]], Ex 10:10; (b) Ge 18:5 [[כן תעשׂה כאשׁר דברת]], Ne 5:12.—Occasionally in poetry [[כאשׁר]] is not expressed : Is 54:9 (De), Is 55:9 Je 3:20, Job 7:9, Ho 11:2 [[קראו להם כן הלכו מפניהם]] (of degree: so = in the same proportion), Ps 48:6 [[המה ראו כן תמהו]] (i.e. in the same measure that they saw); Je 33:22 (acc. to many, but dub.; rd. prob. [[כאשׁר]] Gie) it is represented by [[אשׁר]] (so Is 54:9 Hi Ew Di): Ju Jdg 5:15 [[כ]] is not expressed.—Na 1:12 is prob. corrupt; Zec 11:11 for [[כן עניי]] rd. [[כְּנַעֲנֵי]].—[[כּׂה]], [[כָּכָה]], [[כָּזאׁת]] are syn., but differ considerably in usage.

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: [[אַחַר־כֵּן]], [[אַחֲרֵי־כֵן]], [[בָּשָׁן]], lit. after so, i.e. afterwards: v. [[אַחַר]].

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: † [[בְּכֵן]] (late), lit. in such circumstances, i.e. thereupon, then, Ec 8:10, Es 4:16 (Targum [[בְּכֵין]] oft. for [[אָז]]; e.g. Ex 15:1; Syr:Jerus. bkn = to/te).

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: † [[כֵּן כְּמוֹ־]] Is 51:6, acc. to some, like so, i.e. (Vrss Rabb) in like manner, or (De) like this (accompanied by a contemptuous gesture) = like a mere nothing: but v. IV. [[כֵּן]].

definitions.title: d.
definitions.body: [[לָכֵן]]:200 according to such conditions, that being so, therefore Nu 16:11, 1Sa 27:6, Ps 16:9, Ps 73:6, Ps 73:10; esp. in proph., where it often introduces, after statement of the grounds, a divine declaration or command : Ju Jdg 10:13, 2Ki 1:6, Am 4:12, Is 5:13, Is 5:14, Is 5:24, Is 7:14, Is 10:16, Is 16:7, Is 27:9, Je 6:15, Je 8:10 etc.; ´[[לכן כה אמר י]] 2Ki 21:12, Is 10:24, Is 28:16, Is 29:22, Is 30:12, Is 37:33, Je 5:14, Je 6:21 + oft.; sq. [[נאם האדון]] Is 1:24; ´[[נאם י]] 1Sa 2:30, Je 2:9; ´[[לכן הנה ימים באים נאם י]] Je 7:32, Je 16:14, Je 19:6 +; ´[[לכן חי אני נאם י]] Ez Eze 5:11, Eze 35:6, Eze 35:11, Zep 2:9; [[לכן]] …[[הנני ]] 1Ki 14:10, Ho 2:8, Ho 2:16, Is 29:14, Je 16:21, Ez Eze 16:37, Eze 22:19 b, Eze 25:4, Eze 25:7, Eze 25:9 +; [[לכן אֱמׂר]] † Ex 6:6, Nu 25:12 (both P), Ez Eze 11:16, Eze 11:17, Eze 14:6, Eze 20:30, Eze 33:25, Eze 36:22; [[לָכֵן דַּבֵּר]] † Ez Eze 14:4 Eze 20:27; [[לָכֵן הִנׇּכֵא]] † Ez Eze 11:4, Eze 36:3, Eze 36:6, Eze 37:12, Eze 38:14; .…[[לָכֵן שִׁמְעוּ]] Is 28:14, Is 51:21, Je 6:18, Je 44:26 +. In answer to [[יען]], Nu 20:12 (P), 1Ki 14:10, 2Ki 1:16, 2Ki 21:12, 2Ki 22:20, Is 29:14, Is 30:13, Je 19:6 +, Ez Eze 5:8, Eze 13:23 +; so, once, [[וְלָכֵן]] Is 8:7; to [[כי]] Is 28:16, Je 35:17; [[על]] Je 9:14; [[אם]] Je 23:38, Je 42:15. Special usages:—(a) idiom., in conversation, in reply to an objection, to state the ground upon which the answer is made; Ge 4:15 therefore—this being so—whoso killeth Cain, etc., Ge 30:15, Ju Jdg 8:7, Jdg 11:8, 1Sa 28:2, 1Ki 22:19, Job 20:2 (LXX in Gn K Jb, not perceiving the idiom, renders ou)xou(/twv (as though [[לא־כן]]): so also strangely, elsewhere, as 1Sa 3:14, 2Ki 1:4, 2Ki 1:6, 2Ki 21:12). (b) inferring the cause from the effect, or developing what is logically involved in a statement, Is 26:14 b (cf. De) therefore thou hast visited and destroyed them (not a consequence of v:a ‘the dead rise not,’ but the development of what is implicit in it), Is 61:7, Je 2:33, Je 5:2 (because viz. [[אין אמונה]] v:Je 5:1), Job 34:25, Job 42:3.—Zec 11:7 rd. [[לִכְנַעֲנֵי הַצּאׁן]].

definitions.title: e.
definitions.body: † [[עַד־כֵּן]] hitherto (of time), as yet Ne 2:16. f. [[עַל־כֵּן]]:145 upon ground of such conditions, therefore (introducing, more generally than [[לָכֵן]], the statement of a fact, rather than a declaration: never used in the phrases noted under [[לָכֵן]]), Ge 20:6, Ge 42:21, Ex 5:8, Ex 5:17, Ex 16:29, Ex 20:11, 1Sa 20:29, 1Sa 28:18, 2Sa 7:22, 2Sa 7:27, 1Ki 20:23, Is 5:25, Is 9:16, Is 13:7, Is 13:13, Is 15:4, Is 15:7, Is 16:9, Is 16:11, Is 17:10, Is 21:3, Je 5:6, Je 5:27, Je 10:21, Je 12:8, Je 20:11, Je 31:3, Je 31:20, Ez Eze 7:20, Eze 22:4, Eze 31:5 etc., Ps 1:5, Ps 42:7, Ps 45:3 c (the poet's inference from v:a. b), v:Ps 45:8, Ps 110:7, Job 6:3, Job 9:22, Job 17:4, Job 20:21 etc., Ct So 1:3; and regularly where the origin of a name, or custom, or proverb is assigned, Ge 2:24 ´[[על־כן יעזב אישׁ וג]], Ge 10:9 [[יֵאָêַמרעל־כן]], Ge 11:9 [[על־כן קרא שׁמה בבל]], Ge 16:14, Ge 19:22, Ge 21:31, Ge 25:30, Ge 26:33, Ge 29:34, Ge 29:35, Ge 30:6, Ge 32:33, Ge 47:22, Ex 13:15, Ex 15:23, Nu 18:24, Nu 21:14, Nu 21:27, De 10:9 (cf. De 15:11, De 15:15, De 19:7, De 24:18, De 24:22), Jos 7:26, Jos 14:14, Ju Jdg 15:19, Jdg 18:12, 1Sa 5:5, 1Sa 10:12, 1Sa 23:28 (? rd. so 1Sa 27:6) 2Sa 5:8, 2Sa 5:20 etc.; [[הַעַל־כֵּן]] † Hb Hab 1:17.—Es 9:26 the 2nd [[על כן]] (unless dittogr.) points unusually onwards to [[האגרתעל כל דברי]] on this account, on account, viz., etc.
